text: Scan all -around king privacy policy

Scan the Almighty King Department by Shanghai Linguan Data Technology Co., Ltd. (Shanghai Holy Information Technology Co., Ltd., a wholly -owned subsidiary, registered address: Room 1102, 1256, 1258, Wanrong Road, Jing'an District, Shanghai, Tel: 4006083063, hereinafter referred to as abbreviationThe application of practical tools (intelligent scanning and text recognition) operations operated by "Linguan Data" or "We").
label: Contact Information

text: We attach great importance to the personal information and privacy of protecting users (hereinafter referred to as "you").
When you register, log in, and use the scanning Almighty King, we will collect, use, save, and share your personal information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In order to show our personal information, we specially formulated the "Scanning Almighty Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as the "Privacy Policy"), and we promised to handle your personal information strictly in accordance with this privacy policy.
You can also quickly learn about the previous descriptions through the "Summary of the Privacy of the Almighty King".
Before you register and log in to scan the Almighty King, please read this privacy policy carefully and fully understand the content of each terms.
You know and confirm that when you check or click "Agree" privacy policy, you agree that you agree that we will process your personal information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When you check or click "Agree" privacy policy, you agree to deal with personal information in accordance with this privacy policy.

text: The scope of the application of this privacy policy includes scanning the Almighty King App (Android), scanning Almighty King-Custom Edition App (Android), and Camscanner App (Android).
This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we save your personal information
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we use cookie technology
5. How to get your personal information of third -party products or services
6. How do we protect your personal information
7. How do you manage your personal information
8. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
9. How can your personal information be transferred globally
10. How to update this privacy policy
Eleven, how to contact us
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
We divide the business functions of the Almighty King into basic business functions and expand business functions:
(1) Basic business functions are the necessary functions of document scanning and management, including document scanning, storage, and management.
(2) Extended business functions include OCR recognition based on scanning documents and personalized accounts.
Please understand that scanning all -round king may need to open part of the authority and collect the necessary personal information to achieve part of the service.

You can quickly understand the personal information and calls collected by our personal information and calls by querying the "Personal Information Collection List" and "Application Railing Restrictions" in specific business functions/scenarios.
(1) In basic business functions, we collect and use your personal information.
1. Account registration
When you register and scan the whole king, we need to collect your mobile phone number, e -mail, and login password.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you register to scan the whole king, you need to collect your mobile phone number, email, and login password.

label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect your mobile phone number, email address, and login password to complete registration and protect account security.

First Party Collection Information
